data.title: Facebook’s revenue climbs 18% in the first quarter
data.text: Facebook Inc. (NASDAQ: FB) released an upbeat financial report for the first quarter on Wednesday that sent its stock up roughly 10% in extended trading.

data.title: Facebook could address some U.S. antitrust concerns with new photo transfer tool
data.text: Facebook Inc  will allow users in the United States and Canada to transfer photos and videos to a rival tech platform for the first time - a step that could assuage antitrust concerns by giving users an option to easily leave the company's services, the social media network said on Thursday.

data.title: Munster Says Still 'Neutral' On Facebook's Long-Term Outlook Despite Impressive Q1 Results
data.text: Loup Ventures Managing Partner Gene Munster on Wednesday said Facebook Inc.'s (NASDAQ: FB) results are impressive in the short-term, but he still doesn't see the company favorably in the long-term.
